title: In Conversation with Tully Arnot
headline_credit: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia and Sydney, New South Wales, Australia, 24 APR 2019
brief_description: In conversation with artist Tully Arnot and ACMI curator Shelley McSpedden to discuss the development of his new work Epiphytes as the Mordant Family VR Commission’s recipient.
